department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase, delivery, installation, and maintenance training for 10 Air-Mobile Containers at CFB Bagotville.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All statements of capabilities and required supporting documentation must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on the 1st of September 2022.
full_summary:
### W0138-21A066 House Movers Air-Mobile Containers
#### Request for Proposal
* **Reference Number**: WS3248373968-Doc3374376651
* **Publication Date**: 2022-08-15
* **Proposal Closing Date**: 2022-09-01T14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)

We are seeking a proposal for the purchase, delivery, installation, and maintenance training for ten (10) air-mobile containers at Canadian Forces Base Bagotville, Alouette, Quebec. The containers must meet the specifications of the AAR ISU 90I 4DOOR or an equivalent.

This competitive procurement is open to all qualified contractors who can meet the requirements outlined in the proposal document.

#### Advertisement Details
* **Preferrd Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, etc.

#### Contact
*  Guyonnet, Pierre (SPAC/PSPC)
*  pierre.guyonnet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice and Documents
* The detailed proposal document is available for download from Ariba Discovery site
* Contact the above-mentioned contact for any clarification on the proposal requirements

# Technical Specifications
The proposal must specifically outline the details of the containers to be delivered, including:

* A description of the containers and their equivalent alternatives to meet the requirements of the Department of National Defence (DND)
* Installation and commissioning services
* Maintenance training services for the provided containers
* Desired timeframe for delivery and installation

#### Terms of the Proposal
Please be advised that all the supporting documents and capabilities must be submitted latest by 2 PM EDT on September 1, 2022. Any proposals received after this time will be considered non-responsive.

### Government Procurement Details
* **Procurement Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity**: Canadian Forces Base Bagotville, Alouette, Quebec

I kept everything in the rundown document but rephrased all sentences to make them more concise and clear. If a term or descriptor was unclear, I translated it best judgement.

Here are some choices I made in rephrasing:

* I used the more direct and polished term "Request for Proposal" (RFP) instead of "Demande de Propositions"
* I changed the format to make each section clearer
* Some translations do not
